page.title: 17A CHILDREN'S GAME
page.content: { French skipping}is a{game}played in which we have good fun and it's one of the most popular games in school for girls. It is played with about{three {metres of elastic.}It is tied into a ring. Two people stand with their feet in the elastic. Three or more people can play. One girl starts jumping over the elastic on normals which is standing with your feet about one pace apart and the elastic round their ankles. When she has done that the people at the ends put the elastic round their knees then thighs, waists and some people even do armpits and necks. Then the people at the ends put their feet tight together which makes it a bit harder for the person who is jumping.Next they put just one foot in the elastic.Then they stand with their feet as far apart as they can.
